text: Orthodontopsis is a genus of moss in the family Orthodontiaceae. It contains twohttp://www.theplantlist.org/1.1/browse/B/Bryaceae/Orthodontopsis/ species: * Orthodontopsis bardunovii, Ignatov & B.C.Tan * Orthodontopsis lignicola, Ignatov & B.C.Tan ==References== Category:Moss genera Category:Rhizogoniales Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Orthodontopsis
